name: RDParallaxController
tagline: Add a parallax top view to any UIScrollView (incl. UITableViews) - #Parallax #ScrollView #TableView #Header
body:
# RDParallaxController # - Add a parallax top view to any UIScrollView - Inspired by apps like foursquare or path ![Demo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ReDetection/RDParallaxController/master/Sample/ParallaxSample.gif) ## Features ##
  • Supports any UIScrollView
  • Use any UIView for the top view
  • Rich delegation methods for:
    • Top view tap
    • Pan over boundary
    • Full size top view
    • Scroll states
  • Uses plain views that already exist in your UIViewController
  • Keep contol of your UIScrollView delegate
  • Works with Storyboards
  • Developed for iOS7 (but should by compatible to iOS 5 - but not tested)
## More Parallax Views ## - [QMBParallaxScrollViewController](https://github.com/quemb/QMBParallaxScrollViewController) â€” this was original parallax controller, mine derivative does not requires viewControllers for top and bottom view and easier to configure from storyboard - [M6ParallaxController](https://github.com/xelvenone/M6ParallaxController) - [A3ParallaxScrollView](https://github.com/allaboutapps/A3ParallaxScrollView) - [MDCParallaxVie](https://github.com/modocache/MDCParallaxView)
